userStoryOptions2.label: viewing Investment Opportunity matching my criteria
userStoryOptions2.text1: We have a tool you might like to check out: our CIOT. (description). Would you like to go to the CIOT?

userStoryOptions2.label: learning more about the province or a specific area of BC
userStoryOptions2.text1:
Great!

You can choose between different types of areas from Communities and Unincorporated Areas, First Nations land and Reserves, Regional District to larger Economic Regions or Tourism Regions.

What kind of area would you like to look at?
userStoryOptions2.text2: I would like to look at

userStoryOptions2.label: discovering insights and patterns among BC communities
userStoryOptions2.text1: We have a criteria search that has many types of filters to help you narrow down specific areas of BC that matches your criteria.
userStoryOptions2.text2: Would you like to try it?

userStoryOptions2.label: promoting an investment opportunity in my community
